reviewText: A funny, but dumb sexually charged Mexican movie.

The original movie is actually very funny & sexy. WARNING: DO NOT BUY THIS DVD!!! It was apparently transfered not from a master tape but from a store VHS tape (& a used one at that) so the movie is, LITERALLY, un-watchable. I even tried to see it in a Blu Ray player that upconverts to 720 & all it did was magnify the scratchiness & darkness of the scenes. If you find it on late night Spanish TV, record it & you'll be getting a copy that is ten times better than this DVD. If you take $10 bucks & light-it on fire, you'll feel a whole lot better than you will if you buy this DVD.
